birth_place.zh-cn: 山西省忻州直隶州定襄县蒋村
birth_place.en: Jiang Village, Dingxiang County, Xinzhou Prefecture, Shanxi Province

death_place.en: Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人，是邓小平主政时期的中共八大元老之一，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的第一、二、三代主要领导人之一。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party and People's Republic of China political figure, a former deputy national leader, one of the Eight Elders of the CCP during Deng Xiaoping's administration, and one of the main leaders of the first, second, and third generations of the CCP and PRC.

zh-cn: 山西省立国民师范学校

description.zh-cn: 薄一波早年就读的师范学校。
description.en: The normal school that Bo Yibo attended in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的直属机构，薄一波曾在此学习。
description.en: An institution directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, where Bo Yibo once studied.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间由薄一波创建的群众抗日团体。
description.en: A mass anti-Japanese organization founded by Bo Yibo during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间由薄一波组建的山西新军部队。
description.en: A unit of the Shanxi New Army organized by Bo Yibo during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期的军事家、政治人物，晋系军阀的代表人物。
description.en: A military leader and politician during the Republic of China era on the mainland, representative of the Shanxi clique.

description.zh-cn: 1939年底，阎锡山在山西发动的意图消灭山西新军的军事行动。
description.en: A military operation launched by Yan Xishan in Shanxi at the end of 1939 with the intent to eliminate the Shanxi New Army.

description.zh-cn: 八路军的主力师之一，晋西事变后山西青年抗敌决死队被编入其序列。
description.en: One of the main divisions of the Eighth Route Army. After the Jinxi Incident, the Shanxi Youth Anti-Enemy Dare-to-Die Corps was incorporated into its ranks.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期在晋东南地区建立的抗日根据地军事组织。
description.en: A military organization of the anti-Japanese base area established in the southeastern Shanxi area during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间中共设立的军事区域。
description.en: A military region established by the CCP during the second phase of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。
description.en: The paramount leader of the second generation of the Communist Party of China leadership.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军华北军区野战部队

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间中国人民解放军的主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the second phase of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在华北地区的中央派出机构。
description.en: The dispatched agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China in North China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设的七大军区之一。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立前，中共在华北地区设立的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body established by the CCP in North China before the founding of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府下属的财政主管机构。
description.en: The financial authority under the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责宏观经济管理。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for macroeconomic management.

en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副总理职位。
description.en: The position of Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leadership bodies of the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年间设立的中共中央组织，旨在解决领导干部的新老交替问题。
description.en: An organization of the CCP Central Committee established from 1982 to 1992 to address the transition of leadership cadres.

description.zh-cn: 一份旨在纠正“大跃进”中工业领域“左”倾错误的政策文件。
description.en: A policy document aimed at correcting the 'leftist' errors in the industrial sector during the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，因在文化大革命中的行为而广受争议。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, widely controversial for his actions during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场大规模政治运动，对包括薄一波在内的许多领导人造成了严重迫害。
description.en: A large-scale political movement in the People's Republic of China that resulted in severe persecution of many leaders, including Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的第二任妻子，曾在文革期间自杀。
description.en: Bo Yibo's second wife, who committed suicide during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席和总书记，是改革开放初期的重要领导人。
description.en: Former Chairman and General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, a key leader in the early period of reform and opening up.

description.zh-cn: 1986年底在中国各地爆发的大规模学生示威游行，成为导致胡耀邦下台的导火索。
description.en: Large-scale student demonstrations that broke out across China at the end of 1986, which became the catalyst for Hu Yaobang's removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 指国家在非常时期采取的一种紧急措施。在1989年六四事件前夕，北京实施了戒严。
description.en: An emergency measure taken by a state in extraordinary times. Martial law was imposed in Beijing on the eve of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的父亲。
description.en: Father of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的第一任妻子。
description.en: Bo Yibo's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的长女。
description.en: Bo Yibo's eldest daughter.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的二女。
description.en: Bo Yibo's second daughter.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的长子。
description.en: Bo Yibo's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的二子，前中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记。
description.en: Bo Yibo's second son, former member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的三女。
description.en: Bo Yibo's third daughter.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的三子。
description.en: Bo Yibo's third son.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的四子。
description.en: Bo Yibo's fourth son.

description.zh-cn: 山西省忻州市下辖的县，薄一波的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Xinzhou City, Shanxi Province, and the birthplace of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国家主席，在文化大革命期间被迫害致死。
description.en: Former President of the People's Republic of China, who was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，长期负责经济工作。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CCP, long in charge of economic work.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CCP, formerly Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CCP, formerly Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CCP, formerly Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任国务院副总理，是习近平的父亲。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CCP, formerly Vice Premier of the State Council, and father of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 1922年考入山西省立国民师范学校学习。
description.en: Admitted to Shanxi Provincial National Normal School in 1922.

description.zh-cn: 1943年12月赴延安入中共中央党校学习。
description.en: Went to Yan'an in December 1943 to study at the Party School of the Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 1925年12月由中国共产主义青年团团员转为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Transferred from a member of the Communist Youth League of China to a member of the Communist Party of China in December 1925.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，创建牺牲救国同盟会，并参与领导工作。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, he founded the Sacrifice for National Salvation League and participated in its leadership.

description.zh-cn: 在阎锡山的支持下，组建山西新军部队“山西青年抗敌决死队”。
description.en: With the support of Yan Xishan, he formed the Shanxi New Army unit 'Shanxi Youth Anti-Enemy Dare-to-Die Corps'.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山发动晋西事变，意图消灭由薄一波创建的山西新军。
description.en: Yan Xishan launched the Jinxi Incident in an attempt to eliminate the Shanxi New Army founded by Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 晋西事变后，薄一波率领的山西新军编入八路军129师序列。
description.en: After the Jinxi Incident, the Shanxi New Army led by Bo Yibo was incorporated into the sequence of the 129th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 1941年1月，薄一波任八路军太岳军区司令员兼政治委员。
description.en: In January 1941, Bo Yibo served as commander and political commissar of the Taiyue Military Region of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，薄一波任晋冀鲁豫军区副政委。
description.en: In 1945, Bo Yibo served as the deputy political commissar of the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 在晋冀鲁豫中央局，薄一波任副书记，协助书记邓小平主持日常工作。
description.en: In the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Central Bureau, Bo Yibo served as deputy secretary, assisting Secretary Deng Xiaoping in managing daily affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，薄一波出任首任中央人民政府财政部部长。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Bo Yibo became the first Minister of Finance of the Central People's Government.

position.zh-cn: 财政部部长、国务院副总理
position.en: Minister of Finance, Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来担任政务院总理和国务院总理期间，薄一波先后担任财政部部长和国务院副总理。
description.en: During Zhou Enlai's tenure as Premier of the Government Administration Council and Premier of the State Council, Bo Yibo served successively as Minister of Finance and Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 1956年5月，国家经济委员会成立，薄一波任主任。
description.en: In May 1956, the State Economic Commission was established, and Bo Yibo was appointed as its director.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波曾两度担任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Bo Yibo served twice as Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波担任中顾委常务副主任，主持日常工作。
description.en: Bo Yibo served as the Executive Deputy Director of the Central Advisory Commission, presiding over its daily work.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波与邓小平共同主持起草了旨在调整工业政策的“工业七十条”。
description.en: Bo Yibo and Deng Xiaoping jointly presided over the drafting of the 'Seventy Articles on Industry' aimed at adjusting industrial policy.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平与薄一波共同主持起草了旨在调整工业政策的“工业七十条”。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping and Bo Yibo jointly presided over the drafting of the 'Seventy Articles on Industry' aimed at adjusting industrial policy.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，因康生举报并举出“六十一人叛徒集团案”，薄一波遭到迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Bo Yibo was persecuted after Kang Sheng reported and cited the 'Case of 61 Renegades'.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，薄一波因“六十一人叛徒集团案”被诬陷打倒，并遭到迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Bo Yibo was falsely accused, overthrown, and persecuted in connection with the 'Case of 61 Renegades'.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的妻子胡明在被批斗送押期间服安眠药自杀。
description.en: Bo Yibo's wife, Hu Ming, committed suicide by taking sleeping pills while being detained and subjected to struggle sessions.

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月，胡耀邦主持为薄一波彻底平反，恢复了其名誉。
description.en: In December 1978, Hu Yaobang presided over the complete rehabilitation of Bo Yibo, restoring his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波主持了批评胡耀邦的“党内生活会”，导致胡耀邦被迫辞去总书记职务。
description.en: Bo Yibo presided over the 'Party life meeting' that criticized Hu Yaobang, leading to Hu's forced resignation as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 八六学潮被中共元老归咎于胡耀邦的纵容，成为其下台的直接原因。
description.en: The 1986 student protests were blamed by CCP elders on Hu Yaobang's indulgence, becoming the direct cause of his downfall.

description.zh-cn: 与薄一波等中共元老一同商议并推动了胡耀邦的去职。
description.en: Along with Bo Yibo and other CCP elders, discussed and promoted the removal of Hu Yaobang from his post.

description.zh-cn: 与薄一波等中共元老一同商议并推动了胡耀邦的去职。
description.en: Along with Bo Yibo and other CCP elders, discussed and promoted the removal of Hu Yaobang from his post.

description.zh-cn: 与薄一波等中共元老一同商议并推动了胡耀邦的去职。
description.en: Along with Bo Yibo and other CCP elders, discussed and promoted the removal of Hu Yaobang from his post.

description.zh-cn: 与薄一波等中共元老一同商议并推动了胡耀邦的去职。
description.en: Along with Bo Yibo and other CCP elders, discussed and promoted the removal of Hu Yaobang from his post.

description.zh-cn: 在逼迫胡耀邦下台的“党内生活会”上，习仲勋是唯一一位支持胡耀邦的与会者。
description.en: At the 'Party life meeting' that forced Hu Yaobang to step down, Xi Zhongxun was the only participant to support Hu.

description.zh-cn: 在1989年六四天安门事件前夕，薄一波向邓小平提出要采取果断措施，并参加了决定对北京实施戒严的会议。
description.en: On the eve of the 1989 Tiananmen Square incident, Bo Yibo proposed to Deng Xiaoping to take decisive measures and attended the meeting that decided to impose martial law in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 经刘少奇领导的中共中央北方局建议，薄一波于1936年得以出狱。
description.en: Following a proposal from the CCP Central Committee's Northern Bureau led by Liu Shaoqi, Bo Yibo was released from prison in 1936.
